00030 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {

00032 #define M_2PI   (2*M_PI)
00033 
00034 inline double deg2rad(double d ) { return d * M_PI / 180; }
00035 inline double rad2deg(double d ) { return d * 180 / M_PI; }
00036 inline double    m2mm(double m ) { return      m *  1000; }
00037 inline double    mm2m(double mm) { return     mm * 0.001; }
00038 
00039 // XXX non qui, non ï¿½ "geometria"
00040 template <class X> inline int sgn(X d) { return d<0?-1:1; }
00041 
00043 template<class X> inline X square(const X& x) { return x*x; }

00047 
00048 #ifdef CYGWIN
00049     #define RDK_INF32 ((float)infinity())
00050     #define RDK_INF64 (infinity())
00051     #define RDK_NAN (nan(0))
00052 #else
00053     #define RDK_INF32 ((float)INFINITY) 
00054     #define RDK_INF64 INFINITY
00055     #define RDK_NAN NAN
00056 #endif
00057 
00059 #define RDK_NAN_STRING "nan"
00060 #define RDK_INF_STRING "inf"
00061     
00063 template<typename T>
00064 inline bool RDK_ISNAN(T a) { return a != a; }
00065 
00067 inline bool RDK_ISINF(double a) { return a == RDK_INF64; }
00069 inline bool RDK_ISINF(float  a) { return a == RDK_INF32; }
00070 
00071 // Il modo giusto per confrontare due float o due double
00072 // Restituisce true se sono entrambi NAN.
00073 // Prevede una tolleranza di epsilon (default: 0)
00074 template<typename T>
00075 bool sameFloat(T a, T b, T epsilon=0) {
00076     if(RDK_ISNAN(a) && RDK_ISNAN(b)) return true;
00077     if(RDK_ISNAN(a) || RDK_ISNAN(b)) return false;
00078     return (a == b) || (fabs(a-b) < epsilon);
00079 }
00080 
00082 bool string2float(const std::string& s, double &v); 
00084 bool string2float(const std::string& s, float &v);  
00085 
00086 template<typename T>
00087 std::string float2string(T v) {
00088     if(RDK_ISNAN(v))
00089         return  RDK_NAN_STRING;
00090     if(RDK_ISINF(v))
00091         return  RDK_INF_STRING;
00092     std::ostringstream oss;
00093     oss << v;
00094     return oss.str();
00095 }
00096 
00097 }}
